channel.title: Those crazy guys in bad company are at it again.
channel.description:
The PC BC2 beta comes out jan 20 something :smiley:
Anyone else get a key? :awesome:

item.title: Those crazy guys in bad company are at it again.

I don’t have class all tomorrow, I may even put off waxing my Snowboard till the weekend.
